citationDetail: Kennedy, J. J., N. A. Rayner, H. A. Titchner, S. C. Millington, M. Saunby, R. O. Smith: The Met Office Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea-Surface Temperature data set, version 2.2.0.0, in prep.
title: The Met Office Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea-Surface Temperature data set, version 2.2.0.0

url.description: The Met Office Hadley Centre's sea ice and sea surface temperature (SST) data set, HadISST, is a unique combination of monthly globally-complete fields of SST and sea ice concentration on a 1 degree latitude-longitude grid from 1850 to date. The latest versions replace the previous version (HadISST1), and the Global sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature (GISST) data sets.
url.name: Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature data set (HadISST.2)

abstract: The Met Office Hadley Centre's sea ice and sea surface temperature (SST) data set, HadISST, is a unique combination of daily globally-complete fields of SST and sea ice concentration on a 1/4 degree latitude-longitude grid from 1850 to date.
context: Sea surface temperature (SST) data set of daily globally-complete fields of SST and sea ice concentration on a 1/4 degree latitude-longitude grid from 1850 to date.
